ChecklistItems.item: Choose primary color scheme for the furniture layout.
ChecklistItems.notes: Consider using neutral tones with bold accents.

ChecklistItems.item: Coordinate with interior design team for cohesive style.
ChecklistItems.notes: Ensure the furniture matches the overall theme of the space.
Evaluate durability and aesthetics of different materials.

ChecklistItems.item: Review space planning and layout options.
ChecklistItems.notes: Optimize for functionality and flow of the space.

ChecklistItems.item: Consult with lighting designer for furniture placement.
ChecklistItems.notes: Ensure furniture is placed to maximize natural and artificial lighting.
